channel.title: github on Gerai Inovasi
channel.description: Recent content in github on Gerai Inovasi

item.title: Get Oath2 Github Token Using Only Web Browser and Postman
item.description: Login to your github account and go to Developer settings to create new oath2 app. Then fill required information to create new oath app. We will use http://127.0.0.1/callback as Authorization callback URL so that after successful authentication we will be redirected to safe URL (localhost). DON'T use untrusted url as Authorization callback URL. Just use safe url like http://127.0.0.1/callback After successfully registering oath2 application we will be redirected to application settings page.
